params.commitment: The commitment to the bid, computed as        `bytes20(keccak256(abi.encode(nonce, bidValue, tokenContract, tokenId, auctionIndex)))`.
params.erc20Tokens: The amount of ERC20 tokens to be used as collateral
params.tokenContract: The address of the ERC721 contract for the asset        being auctioned.
params.tokenId: The ERC721 token ID of the asset being auctioned.

params.bidPeriod: The duration of the bidding period, in seconds.
params.reservePrice: The minimum price that the asset will be sold for.        If no bids exceed this price, the asset is returned to `seller`.
params.revealPeriod: The duration of the commitment reveal period,        in seconds.
params.startTime: The unix timestamp at which bidding can start.
params.tokenContract: The address of the ERC721 contract for the asset        being auctioned.
params.tokenId: The ERC721 token ID of the asset being auctioned.

params.tokenContract: The address of the ERC721 contract for the asset auctioned.
params.tokenId: The ERC721 token ID of the asset auctioned.

params.tokenContract: The address of the ERC721 contract for the asset auctioned.
params.tokenId: The ERC721 token ID of the asset auctioned.

params.nonce: The random input used to obfuscate the commitment.
params.tokenContract: The address of the ERC721 contract for the asset        being auctioned.
params.tokenId: The ERC721 token ID of the asset being auctioned.

params.auctionIndex: The index of the auction that was being bid on.
params.tokenContract: The address of the ERC721 contract for the asset        that was auctioned.
params.tokenId: The ERC721 token ID of the asset that was auctioned.

auctions(address,uint256).notice: A mapping storing auction parameters and state, indexed by         the ERC721 contract address and token ID of the asset being         auctioned.

bids(address,uint256,uint64,address).notice: A mapping storing bid commitments and records of collateral,         indexed by: ERC721 contract address, token ID, auction index,         and bidder address. If the commitment is `bytes20(0)`, either         no commitment was made or the commitment was opened.

commitBid(address,uint256,bytes20,uint25.notice: Commits to a bid on an item being auctioned. If a bid was         previously committed to, overwrites the previous commitment.         Value attached to this call is used as collateral for the bid.

createAuction(address,uint256,address,ui.notice: Creates an auction for the given ERC721 asset with the given         auction parameters.

endAuction(address,uint256).notice: Ends an active auction. Can only end an auction if the bid reveal         phase is over, or if all bids have been revealed. Disburses the auction         proceeds to the seller. Transfers the auctioned asset to the winning         bidder and returns any excess collateral. If no bidder exceeded the         auction's reserve price, returns the asset to the seller.

getAuction(address,uint256).notice: Gets the parameters and state of an auction in storage.

revealBid(address,uint256,uint96,bytes32.notice: Reveals the value of a bid that was previously committed to.

withdrawCollateral(address,uint256,uint6.notice: Withdraws collateral. Bidder must have opened their bid commitment         and cannot be in the running to win the auction.

documentation.text:
@param commitment The hash commitment of a bid value.
 @param collateral The amount of collateral backing the bid.

@notice A mapping storing bid commitments and records of collateral,
         indexed by: ERC721 contract address, token ID, auction index,
         and bidder address. If the commitment is `bytes20(0)`, either
         no commitment was made or the commitment was opened.
